title: 2018 Mid-Season Invitational Group Stage Opening Tease

json.text: I want EVOS to win every game in the Group Stage. And I want to break every other mid laners' teeth.
We're the only team from last year's MSI that was able to fight our way back this year.
I feel that everyone's skills on the team have all improved
so this time, I want to show everyone
a more consistent, but even stronger Flash Wolves.
The last time I was at MSI was in 2016
and it's been two years since then.
So this time, I want to make up for my regrets from then.
I have played for a long time with PraY.
However, we have yet to win an international tournament.
For Worlds, we got to the Finals when it was in Germany
and this MSI starts off in Germany.
So this time, I really want to get good results
and earn an international tournament trophy.
